unnormalised: Flash sales, eh? Reminds me of the mad rush at Sarojini Nagar on a Sunday! Are these deals *really* worth it, or just Maya jaal like in that Guru Dutt film, Pyaasa? I mean, you gotta be faster than a Delhi auto-rickshaw to snag anything good. Anyone actually scored big on these, or is it all hype? My cousin, Priya, says it's like IIT entrance – super competitive for very little payoff. Share your experiences!
